Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

The Quest
    1. war lost, Two was exiled and turned to banditry
    2. where he assailed souls from all sides
    1. till one day dreaming Two's heart rose up
    2. and sleeping in a cave he had a dream
    1. lift up, take up, stand up, young son, lost one, lost son
    1. go seek the ring - find the cup, rise up young son
    2. you live today - your heart beats still - and still sings on
    1. for none can harm but what you sing, the heart you give
    2. for bliss or ill this is your life _
    1. and you choose how your story ends - not the knife
    2. for hell or heaven, judgement day or angel's song
    1. no prison gate nor plague nor pain shall bar
    2. the mercy of the court - stands uncontested
    1. Two find the cup and ring, the treasure that I sing
    2. and keep on - and on and on, for me, for you
    1. all men die, all churches crumble - all this shall fall
    2. the weight and measure of so much dross - this all
    1. just heart and soul - song and word and breath redeem
    2. the weighty load you carry, wealth or burning coal
    1. all sorrow then - just dust of men, thunder
    2. the beating of the heart and - the singing soul
